channel.title: github pages on Peter Rado
channel.description: Recent content in github pages on Peter Rado

item.title: How I deployed this site to my Github pages
item.description: Quick introduction This is a step by step tutorial how to deploy a Hugo website to {user}.github.io These are the steps I followed: follow the quickstart guide and add the template you find the best for your interest. I use hello-friend-ng. init your local github repository create a new repository on github with name like: {user}.github.io and push your local repo go to the repository settings on github and setup the build: (this means every push to master will trigger a build using the docs folder as source) set the publishDir variable to docs in hugo.
